snippet: The town of Enniskillen, whose association with the country’s sectarian conflict still deters tourists, has undergone a makeover ahead of a summit meeting of world leaders.
abstract: Enniskellen Journal; town of Enniskellen, Northern Ireland, whose association with country's sectarian conflict stills deters tourists, is eagerly preparing for summit meeting of the Group of 8 industrialized nations; many residents hope that international attention from meeting and possible protests may offer opportunity to reinvent town's reputation.
lead_paragraph: The town of Enniskillen, whose association with the country’s sectarian conflict still deters tourists, has undergone a makeover ahead of a summit meeting of world leaders.

headline.seo: Northern Ireland Town Freshens Up Before Group of 8 Meeting
headline.main: Northern Ireland Town Eager for Reinvention Freshens Up for Group of 8
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland Town Eager for Reinvention Freshens Up for Group of 8
